title: no token..
body: went lvl 5 on yorrick and that same game scored an s the prompt came up that i had earnt a token ,click on my hextech when i leave game and low and behold, no token.... is this a bug because it also happened to me on karthus but that was on aram  so i ruled it out because of the map mode and the yorick one was on rift or am i just reading it wrong.
